cards.name: Dervish and Banges
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or an opponent's).
cards.description: Once during each player's turn, when they discard 1 of their Items from play, they may choose a non-Healing Item in their discard pile with printed Power cost less than the discarded Item and put it into their hand.
cards.flavorText: 'Dervish and Banges, the wizarding equipment shop ...'

cards.name: Hogsmeade Station
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or an opponent's).
cards.description: When either player uses an Action to play a card with a printed Power cost, their cards require 2 less Power to play until the end of their turn. (They must have at least 1 Power that matches.)

cards.name: Honeydukes
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or an opponent's).
cards.description: Whenever a player uses an Action to play a Candy card from their hand, they may play another Candy card from their discard pile without using an Action.
cards.flavorText: ''We'll bring you lots of sweets back from Honeydukes,' said Hermione, looking desperately sorry for him.'

cards.name: Madam Rosmerta
cards.description: The first time you would draw any number of cards each turn, you may instead put that many non-Healing cards from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck in any order.
cards.flavorText: 'A curvy sort of woman with a pretty face was serving a bunch of rowdy warlocks up at the bar.'

cards.name: Comet Two Ninety
cards.description: When this card is discarded from play, draw 3 cards. (When you play this card, discard the other Broom(s) you control.)
